cards.name: Platinum Angel
cards.text:
Flying
You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
cards.flavor: In its heart lies the secret of immortality.

rulings.text: Effects that say the game is a draw, such as the _Legends_(TM) card Divine Intervention, are not affected by Platinum Angel. They’ll still work.

You can concede a game while Platinum Angel on the battlefield. A concession causes you to leave the game, which then causes you to lose the game (Once you concede, you no longer control a Platinum Angel, so its ability can’t prevent you from losing the game).

No game effect can cause you to lose the game or cause any opponent to win the game while you control Platinum Angel. It doesn’t matter whether you have 0 or less life, you’re forced to draw a card while your library is empty, you have ten or more poison counters, you’re dealt combat damage by Phage the Untouchable, your opponent has Mortal Combat with twenty or more creature cards in their graveyard, or so on. You keep playing.

Other circumstances can still cause you to lose the game, however. You will lose a game if you concede, if you’re penalized with a Game Loss or a Match Loss during a sanctioned tournament due to a DCI rules infraction, or if your _Magic Online_(R) game clock runs out of time.
If you control Platinum Angel in a Two-Headed Giant game, your team can’t lose the game and the opposing team can’t win the game.

cards.name: Primal Rage
cards.text: Creatures you control have trample. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

foreignNames.name: Ursprüngliche Wut
foreignNames.text: Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, verursachen Trampelschaden. (Falls eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, ihren Blockern genug Schaden zufügen würde, um sie zu zerstören, kannst du sie den Rest des Schadens dem verteidigenden Spieler zufügen lassen.)
foreignNames.flavor: Grausamkeit und Verschlagenheit bedeuteten den halben Sieg. Die Schwerkraft sorgte für den Rest.

foreignNames.name: Furia primitiva
foreignNames.text: Las criaturas que controlas tienen la habilidad de arrollar. (Si una criatura que controles fuera a hacer suficiente daño de combate a sus bloqueadores como para destruirlos, puedes hacer que le haga el resto del daño al jugador defensor.)
foreignNames.flavor: La astucia y la ferocidad valen la mitad de la victoria. La gravedad se encarga del resto.

foreignNames.name: Rage primordiale
foreignNames.text: Les créatures que vous contrôlez ont le piétinement. (Si une créature que vous contrôlez inflige suffisamment de blessures de combat à ses bloqueurs pour les détruire, vous pouvez faire qu'elle inflige le reste de ses blessures au joueur défenseur.)
foreignNames.flavor: La férocité et la ruse n'étaient qu'en partie responsables de la victoire. Ce fut la gravité qui fit le reste.

foreignNames.name: Furia Primordiale
foreignNames.text: Le creature che controlli hanno travolgere. (Se una creatura che controlli sta per infliggere alle sue creature bloccanti danno da combattimento sufficiente a distruggerle, puoi farle infliggere il resto del suo danno al giocatore in difesa.)
foreignNames.flavor: La ferocia e l'astuzia permisero metà della vittoria. La forza di gravità fece il resto.

foreignNames.name: 怒りの発散
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーはトランプルを持つ。 （あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーが、自身をブロックしているすべてのクリーチャーを破壊するのに十分な戦闘ダメージを与える場合、あなたはそれの残りのダメージを防御プレイヤーに与えてもよい。）
foreignNames.flavor: 獰猛さと狡猾さは勝利の理由の半分だ。 残りは重力のおかげだ。

foreignNames.name: Fúria Primordial
foreignNames.text: As criaturas que você controla têm a habilidade de atropelar. (Se uma criatura que você controla fosse causar dano de combate suficiente para destruir seus bloqueadores, você pode fazer com que ela cause o resto de seu dano ao jogador defensor.)
foreignNames.flavor: A ferocidade e a astúcia foram responsáveis por metade da vitória. A gravidade foi responsável pelo restante.

foreignNames.name: Первородная Ярость
foreignNames.text: Существа под вашим контролем имеют Пробивной удар. (Если существо под вашим контролем нанесло достаточно боевых повреждений, чтобы уничтожить блокирующие его существа, вы можете нанести оставшиеся повреждения защищающемуся игроку.)
foreignNames.flavor: Свирепость и коварство принесли половину победы. Другую половину обеспечила сила тяжести.

foreignNames.name: 盛怒
foreignNames.text: 由你操控的生物具有践踏异能。 （若由你操控的某生物将造成的战斗伤害足以消灭所有阻挡它的生物，你可以使它对防御牌手造成所剩余数量的伤害。）
foreignNames.flavor: 狂猛与狡诈占了胜利因素的一半。 剩下的则归功于重力。

foreignNames.flavor: "Пусть мой гнев ускорит твою победу".

foreignNames.name: 织怒巧匠
foreignNames.text: {2}：目标黑色或绿色生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。 （它此回合便能攻击与{T}。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「让我的热情激励你的胜利。」

cards.originalText: {2}: Target black or green creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Rage Weaver
cards.text: {2}: Target black or green creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: "Let my passion spur your victory."

cards.name: Raging Goblin
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
cards.flavor: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

foreignNames.name: Wütender Goblin
foreignNames.text: Eile (Diese Kreatur kann angreifen und {T}, sobald sie unter deine Kontrolle kommt.)
foreignNames.flavor: Er tobte gegen die Welt, gegen seine Familie, gegen sein Leben. Aber hauptsächlich tobte er.

foreignNames.name: Trasgo furioso
foreignNames.text: Prisa. (Esta criatura puede atacar y {T} tan pronto como entre bajo tu control.)
foreignNames.flavor: Estaba furioso con su mundo, con su familia, con su vida. Pero principalmente, sólo estaba furioso.

foreignNames.name: Gobelin enragé
foreignNames.text: Célérité (Cette créature peut attaquer et {T} dès le tour où elle arrive sous votre contrôle.)
foreignNames.flavor: Il enrageait contre le monde, contre sa famille, contre lui-même. Mais avant tout, il aimait juste être enragé.

foreignNames.name: Goblin Furioso
foreignNames.text: Rapidità (Questa creatura può attaccare e {T} non appena entra sotto il tuo controllo.)
foreignNames.flavor: E' arrabbiato con il mondo, con la propria famiglia e con la vita. Più che altro è arrabbiato e basta.

foreignNames.name: 怒り狂うゴブリン
foreignNames.text: 速攻 （このクリーチャーは、あなたのコントロール下になってすぐに攻撃したり{T}能力を使ったりできる。）
foreignNames.flavor: 彼は世界に対して怒り、家族に対して怒り、自分の人生に対して怒っていた。 だが、だいたいは理由もなく怒っていたんだ。

foreignNames.name: Goblin Enfurecido
foreignNames.text: Ímpeto (Esta criatura pode atacar e {T} assim que entra sob seu controle.)
foreignNames.flavor: Ele se enfurecia com o mundo, com sua família, com sua vida. Mas acima de tudo, ele se enfurecia.

foreignNames.name: Разъяренный Гоблин
foreignNames.text: Ускорение (Это существо может атаковать и {T}, как только оно попадает под ваш контроль.)
foreignNames.flavor: Он злился на мир, на семью, на свою жизнь. А вообще-то, он просто злился.

foreignNames.name: 愤怒精灵
foreignNames.text: 敏捷（此生物受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。）
foreignNames.flavor: 他对世界、家庭和他的生活都感到愤怒。 但大多时候他只是纯粹愤怒。

cards.originalText: Haste

cards.name: Raging Goblin
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
cards.flavor: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

cards.name: Rain of Tears
cards.text: Destroy target land.
cards.flavor:
"When mortals die, they have family, friends, compatriots to mourn them. When the land dies, all else dies with it, and there is no one left to weep."
—Jacinth, Skyshroud ranger

foreignNames.name: Tränenschauer
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre ein Land deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wenn Sterbliche dahinscheiden, haben sie Familie, Freunde und Genossen, die um sie trauern. Wenn das Land stirbt, dann stirbt auch alles darin, und niemand bleibt übrig, um es zu beklagen." —Jacinth, Wolkenwaldläufer

foreignNames.name: Lluvia de lágrimas
foreignNames.text: Destruye la tierra objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Cuando mueren los mortales, tienen familia, amigos y compatriotas para llorar por ellos. Cuando muere la tierra, todo lo demás muere con ella, y no queda nadie para llorarla." —Jacinth, explorador de Veloceleste

foreignNames.name: Pluie de larmes
foreignNames.text: Détruisez le terrain ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor: « Quand les mortels décèdent, leur famille, leurs amis et leurs compatriotes les pleurent. Quand la terre meurt, tout meurt avec elle, et il ne reste personne pour la pleurer. » —Jacynthe, ranger de Linciel

foreignNames.name: Pioggia di Lacrime
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una terra bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Quando i mortali muoiono, hanno famiglia, amici e compatrioti che piangono per la loro perdita. Quando muore la terra, con essa muore tutto il resto, e non ci rimane nessuno per piangere." —Jacinth, ranger di Cielsudario

foreignNames.name: 涙の雨
foreignNames.text: 土地１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 生あるものが死すとき、その人を嘆く家族や友達や仲間がいます。 大地が死んだとき、他の者たちもすべて死に、悲しむ者は残りません。 ――スカイシュラウドのレインジャー、ジャシンス

foreignNames.name: Chuva de Lágrimas
foreignNames.text: Destrua o terreno alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Quando os mortais morrem, eles têm a família, os amigos e os compatriotas para chorar por eles. Quando a terra morre, tudo morre com ela, e não sobra ninguém para chorar." — Jacinta, patrulheira de Skyshroud

foreignNames.name: Дождь Слез
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевую землю.
foreignNames.flavor: "Когда умирают люди, их оплакивают семьи, друзья, соплеменники. Когда умирает земля, все остальное умирает вместе с ней и плакать больше некому". — Джасинт, скайшраудский егерь

foreignNames.name: 泪雨
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标地。
foreignNames.flavor: 「凡人殒命时，会有家人、朋友与伙伴为之哀悼。 大地殒命时，一切与之共亡，没人能留下追悼。」 ～天帷护林兵贾馨

cards.originalText: Destroy target land.

cards.name: Rampant Growth
cards.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Nature grows solutions to her problems.

rulings.text: The land does not count toward your one per turn limit because it was put onto the battlefield by an effect.
Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

foreignNames.name: Wucherndes Wachstum
foreignNames.text: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardländerkarte und bringe diese Karte getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Natur lässt die Lösungen für ihre Probleme einfach sprießen.

foreignNames.name: Crecimiento exuberante
foreignNames.text: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica y pon en juego esa carta girada. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: La naturaleza cultiva soluciones para sus problemas.

foreignNames.name: Croissance luxuriante
foreignNames.text: Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base et mettez cette carte en jeu engagée. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: La nature crée des solutions à ses problèmes.

foreignNames.name: Crescita Inarrestabile
foreignNames.text: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base e mettila in gioco TAPpata. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: La natura genera soluzioni ai propri problemi.

foreignNames.name: 不屈の自然
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーから基本土地カードを１枚探し、そのカードをタップ状態で場に出す。 その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 自然は問題の解決法を自ら育て上げる。

foreignNames.name: Crescimento Exuberante
foreignNames.text: Procure em seu grimório por um card de terreno básico e coloque-o em jogo virado. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: A natureza cria soluções para seus problemas.

foreignNames.name: Буйный Рост
foreignNames.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли и положите ту карту в игру повернутой. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Решения проблем природы вырастают сами.

foreignNames.name: 徒长
foreignNames.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 大自然为她的问题而栽培答案。

cards.originalText: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Ravenous Rats
cards.text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
cards.flavor: Nothing is sacred to rats. Everything is simply another meal.

foreignNames.name: Gierige Ratten
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Gierigen Ratten ins Spiel kommen, wirft ein Gegner deiner Wahl eine Karte aus seiner Hand ab.
foreignNames.flavor: Den Ratten ist nichts heilig. Alles ist nur eine weitere Mahlzeit.

foreignNames.name: Ratas rapaces
foreignNames.text: Cuando las Ratas rapaces entren en juego, el oponente objetivo descarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Nada es sagrado para las ratas. Todo es simplemente otra comida.

foreignNames.name: Rats voraces
foreignNames.text: Quand ces Rats voraces arrivent en jeu, l'adversaire ciblé se défausse d'une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Pour les rats, rien n'est sacré. La vie n'est qu'un continuel repas.

foreignNames.name: Ratti Famelici
foreignNames.text: Quando i Ratti Famelici entrano in gioco, un avversario bersaglio scarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Niente è sacro per i ratti: tutte le cose sono considerate alla stregua di un pasto.

foreignNames.name: 貪欲なるネズミ
foreignNames.text: 貪欲なるネズミが場に出たとき、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを１枚捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: このネズミらにとって敬意を表すべきものなんか何もない。 何を見てもエサだと思うんだから。

foreignNames.name: Ratos Vorazes
foreignNames.text: Quando Ratos Vorazes entra em jogo, o oponente alvo descarta um card.
foreignNames.flavor: Nada é sagrado para os ratos. Tudo é apenas mais uma refeição.

foreignNames.name: Прожорливые Крысы
foreignNames.text: Когда Прожорливые Крысы входят в игру, целевой оппонент сбрасывает карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Для крыс нет ничего святого. Для них весь мир еда.

foreignNames.name: 贪吃老鼠
foreignNames.text: 当贪吃老鼠进场时，目标对手弃一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 老鼠的眼中没有神圣之物， 所有东西都是一顿饱餐。

cards.originalText: When Ravenous Rats comes into play, target opponent discards a card.

cards.name: Razormane Masticore
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Razormane Masticore unless you discard a card.
At the beginning of your draw step, you may have Razormane Masticore deal 3 damage to target creature.

foreignNames.name: Klingenmähnen-Mastikor
foreignNames.text:
Erstschlag (Diese Kreatur fügt Kampfschaden vor Kreaturen ohne Erstschlag zu.)
Opfere den Klingenmähnen-Mastikor zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments, falls du nicht eine Karte aus deiner Hand abwirfst.
Zu Beginn deines Ziehsegments kannst du den Klingenmähnen-Mastikor einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zufügen lassen.

foreignNames.name: Masticore melena de navajas
foreignNames.text:
Daña primero. (Esta criatura hace daño de combate antes que las criaturas sin la habilidad de dañar primero.)
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, sacrifica la Masticore melena de navajas a menos que descartes una carta.
Al comienzo de tu paso de robar, puedes hacer que la Masticore melena de navajas le haga 3 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo.

foreignNames.name: Masticore à crinière tranchante
foreignNames.text:
Initiative (Cette créature inflige des blessures de combat avant les créatures sans l'initiative.)
Au début de votre entretien, sacrifiez la Masticore à crinière tranchante à moins que vous ne vous défaussiez d'une carte.
Au début de votre étape de pioche, vous pouvez faire que la Masticore à crinière tranchante inflige 3 blessures à la créature ciblée.

foreignNames.name: Masticora Chioma-Lama
foreignNames.text:
Attacco improvviso (Questa creatura infligge danno da combattimento prima delle creature senza attacco improvviso.)
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, sacrifica la Masticora Chioma-Lama a meno che non scarti una carta.
All'inizio della tua acquisizione, puoi fare infliggere dalla Masticora Chioma-Lama 3 danni a una creatura bersaglio.

foreignNames.name: 剃刀毛のマスティコア
foreignNames.text:
先制攻撃 （このクリーチャーは先制攻撃を持たないクリーチャーよりも先に戦闘ダメージを与える。）
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがカードを１枚捨てないかぎり、剃刀毛のマスティコアを生け贄に捧げる。
あなたのドロー・ステップの開始時に、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたは、剃刀毛のマスティコアがそれに３点のダメージを与えることを選んでもよい。

foreignNames.name: Mastícora de Juba Cortante
foreignNames.text:
Iniciativa (Esta criatura causa dano de combate antes de criaturas sem a habilidade de iniciativa.)
No início de sua manutenção, sacrifique Mastícora de Juba Cortante, a menos que você descarte um card.
No início de sua etapa de compra, você pode fazer com que Mastícora de Juba Cortante cause 3 pontos de dano à criatura alvo.

foreignNames.name: Саблегривая Мастикора
foreignNames.text:
Первый удар (Это существо наносит боевые повреждения раньше существ без Первого удара.)
В начале вашего шага поддержки пожертвуйте Саблегривую Мастикору, если только вы не сбросите карту.
В начале вашего шага взятия карты вы можете заставить Саблегривую Мастикору нанести 3 повреждения целевому существу.

foreignNames.name: 锐鬃异狮
foreignNames.text:
先攻（此生物会比不具先攻异能的生物提前造成战斗伤害。）
在你的维持开始时，除非你弃一张牌，否则牺牲锐鬃异狮。
在你的抓牌步骤开始时，你可以让锐鬃异狮对目标生物造成3点伤害。

cards.originalText:
First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Razormane Masticore unless you discard a card.
At the beginning of your draw step, you may have Razormane Masticore deal 3 damage to target creature.

cards.name: Razormane Masticore
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Razormane Masticore unless you discard a card.
At the beginning of your draw step, you may have Razormane Masticore deal 3 damage to target creature.

cards.name: Recollect
cards.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"The bones of the past will tell their tales—if you know how to speak their language."
—Savra

foreignNames.name: Ins Gedächtnis zurückrufen
foreignNames.text: Bringe eine Karte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Knochen der Verblichenen werden ihre Geschichten erzählen — falls du weißt, wie man ihre Sprache spricht." —Savra

foreignNames.name: Recordar
foreignNames.text: Regresa la carta objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: "Los huesos del pasado nos contarán sus historias... si sabes hablar su idioma." —Savra

foreignNames.name: Souvenance
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez une carte ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: « Les os du passé vous raconteront leur histoire — si vous savez parler leur langage. » —Savra

foreignNames.name: Rammentare
foreignNames.text: Riprendi in mano una carta bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: "Le ossa del passato raccontano le loro storie: se sai come parlare la loro lingua." —Savra

foreignNames.name: 喚起
foreignNames.text: あなたの墓地にあるカード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 骨は彼らの過去を語ってくれる――言葉を理解できるのならね。 ――サヴラ

foreignNames.name: Recordar
foreignNames.text: Devolva o card alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: "Os ossos do passado contarão suas histórias se você falar o idioma deles." —Savra

foreignNames.name: Припоминание
foreignNames.text: Верните целевую карту из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreignNames.flavor: "Кости прошлого поведают многое, если умеешь говорить на их языке". — Завра

foreignNames.name: 重拾记忆
foreignNames.text: 将目标牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「逝者的骨骸会诉说他们的故事～只要你了解他们的语言。」 ～撒芙儿

cards.originalText: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Recover
cards.text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: As Barrin exhumed his daughter's body, he finally realized the full price of his faith in Urza.

foreignNames.name: Zurückholung
foreignNames.text: Bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Als Barrin den Körper seiner Tochter exhumierte, begriff er den vollen Preis, den er für sein Vertrauen in Urza zahlen musste.

foreignNames.name: Recuperar
foreignNames.text:
Regresa la carta objetivo de criatura de tu cementerio a tu mano.
Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: En cuanto Barrin exhumó el cuerpo de su hija, finalmente se dio cuenta del precio total de su fe en Urza.

foreignNames.name: Recouvrement
foreignNames.text:
Renvoyez une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Lorsqu'il exhuma le corps de sa fille, Barrin connut le prix de sa foi en Urza.

foreignNames.name: Riesumazione
foreignNames.text:
Riprendi in mano una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Mentre Barrin riesumava il corpo della figlia, si rese conto del vero prezzo della propria fede in Urza.

foreignNames.name: 復活
foreignNames.text:
あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 娘の遺体を掘り起こしながら、バリンはウルザを信頼したために支払わなければならなかった代価の大きさを思い知った。

foreignNames.name: Recuperar
foreignNames.text:
Devolva o card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: Quando Barrin exumou o corpo de sua filha, compreendeu finalmente o verdadeiro preço da sua fé em Urza.

foreignNames.name: Возврат
foreignNames.text:
Верните целевую карту существа из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Извлекая тело дочери, Баррин в конце концов осознал, какую дорогую цену он заплатил за свою преданность Урзе.

foreignNames.name: 复原
foreignNames.text:
将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 当巴林挖出女儿尸体时，他才真正了解效忠克撒的代价。

cards.originalText:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Regeneration
cards.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

foreignNames.name: Regeneration
foreignNames.text:
Kreaturenverzauberung (Bestimme eine Kreatur als Ziel, sowie du diese Karte spielst. Diese Karte kommt an die Kreatur angelegt ins Spiel.)
{G}: Regeneriere die verzauberte Kreatur. (Das nächste Mal, dass diese Kreatur in diesem Zug zerstört würde, wird sie nicht zerstört. Tappe sie stattdessen, entferne allen Schaden von ihr und entferne sie aus dem Kampf.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Gib einen Tropfen des Safts, der durch die Ranken fließt, auf die Wunde, und das Fleisch wird so schnell zusammenwachsen, wie sich neue Wurzeln bilden." —Freyalise

foreignNames.name: Regeneración
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura. (Haz objetivo a una criatura al jugarlo. Esta carta entra en juego anexada a esa criatura.)
{G}: Regenera a la criatura encantada. (La próxima vez que esa criatura fuera a ser destruida este turno, no lo es. En vez de eso, gírala, remueve todo el daño de ella y remuévela del combate.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Un toque de savia en las venas, y la carne se cierra rápidamente como nuevas raíces que se entrecruzan." —Freyalise

foreignNames.name: Régénération
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : créature (Ciblez une créature au moment où vous jouez cette carte. Cette carte arrive en jeu attachée à cette créature.)
{G} : Régénérez la créature enchantée. (La prochaine fois que cette créature devrait être détruite ce tour-ci, elle ne l'est pas. À la place, engagez-la, retirez-lui toutes ses blessures et retirez-la du combat.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Un soupçon de sève de vigne dans le sang, et la chair cicatrise aussi vite que les jeunes racines s'enlacent. » —Freyalise

foreignNames.name: Rigenerazione
foreignNames.text:
Incanta creatura (Bersaglia una creatura mentre giochi questa carta. Questa carta entra in gioco assegnata a quella creatura.)
{G}: Rigenera la creatura incantata. (La prossima volta che quella creatura sta per essere distrutta in questo turno, non viene distrutta. Invece TAPpala, rimuovi da essa tutto il danno e rimuovila dal combattimento.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Un tocco di linfa di vite nel sangue e la carne si salda veloce come le nuove radici che si attorcigliano." —Freyalise

foreignNames.name: 再生
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー） （これをプレイする際に、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。 このカードはそのクリーチャーにつけられている状態で場に出る。）
{G}：エンチャントされているクリーチャーを再生する。 （このターン、次にこのクリーチャーが破壊される場合、破壊されない。 代わりに、それをタップし、それに与えられているダメージをすべて取り除き、それを戦闘から取り除く。）
foreignNames.flavor: 蔦の樹液の一滴よ血を流れ、肉は根のよじれるごとく素早く編みあがれ。 ――フレイアリーズ

foreignNames.name: Regeneração
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura (Ao jogar este card, escolha uma criatura alvo. Este card entra em jogo anexado àquela criatura.)

cards.name: Relentless Assault
cards.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

rulings.text: If you manage to cast this during a main phase of your opponent’s turn, that opponent’s creatures will untap and that opponent will be able to attack again. It will not allow you to attack during their turn.
Abilities that trigger when a creature attacks, blocks, or is blocked will trigger during each combat that turn. Thus, a creature with Rampage will get the bonus added during each attack.
A creature that must attack each turn, must only attack once that turn. It is not forced into each attack that turn.
It only creates an additional combat and main phase if it resolves during a main phase.

You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
{2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

rulings.text: You can decide to assign damage to the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creature has protection from green or damage preventing effects on it.

When assigning combat damage, you choose whether you want to assign all damage to blocking creatures, or if you want to assign all of it to the player or planeswalker this creature is attacking. You can’t split the damage assignment between them.
If blocked by a creature with banding, the defending player decides whether or not the damage is assigned “as though it weren’t blocked”.

You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
{2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
cards.flavor: It's as solid as the club in its hand—and about as subtle.

rulings.text: You can decide to assign damage to the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creature has protection from green or damage preventing effects on it.

When assigning combat damage, you choose whether you want to assign all damage to blocking creatures, or if you want to assign all of it to the player or planeswalker this creature is attacking. You can’t split the damage assignment between them.
If blocked by a creature with banding, the defending player decides whether or not the damage is assigned “as though it weren’t blocked”.

rulings.text: A “blocking creature” is one that has been declared as a blocker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield blocking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be a blocking creature through the end of combat step, even if the creature or creatures it was blocking are no longer on the battlefield or have otherwise left combat.

cards.name: Rootwater Matriarch

rulings.text: Can target an unenchanted creature but has no effect on that creature.
A creature is “enchanted” if it has any Auras attached to it.
Unlike many similar creatures, Rootwater Matriarch untaps as normal during your untap step. Whether it’s tapped or untapped has no bearing on the control-change effect.

The control effect applies so long as at least one Aura is attached to the creature, and will continue to apply even if Rootwater Matriarch has left the battlefield. The effect ends if at any time the creature has no Auras on it.

foreignNames.flavor: En las crueles profundidades de Raícesanegadas, los amuletos de los habitantes de la superficie son bastante inútiles... excepto como señuelos.

foreignNames.name: Matriarche de Souchemer
foreignNames.text: {T} : Acquérez le contrôle de la créature ciblée tant que cette créature est enchantée.
foreignNames.flavor: Dans les abîmes cruelles de Souchemer, les charmes des êtres de la surface sont généralement inutiles . . . sauf pour servir d'appât.

foreignNames.name: Matriarca di Morteacque
foreignNames.text: {T}: Prendi il controllo di una creatura bersaglio fintanto che quella creatura è incantata.
foreignNames.flavor: Nelle aspre profondità di Morteacque, il fascino degli abitanti di superficie è decisamente inutile. . . se non come esca.

foreignNames.name: ルートウォーターの女族長
foreignNames.text: {T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それがエンチャントされているかぎり、それのコントロールを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: ルートウォーターの遥かな深みでは、水面に住むものに対する魅惑など極めて無意味だ……寄せ餌として以外は。

foreignNames.name: Matriarca de Rootwater
foreignNames.text: {T}: Ganhe o controle da criatura alvo enquanto aquela criatura estiver encantada.
foreignNames.flavor: Nas cruéis profundezas de Rootwater, os encantos dos residentes da superfície são inúteis... a não ser como iscas.

foreignNames.name: Родоначальница Рутвотера
foreignNames.text: {T}: Получите контроль над целевым существом, пока то существо зачаровано.
foreignNames.flavor: В суровых глубинах Рутвотера амулеты обитателей поверхности абсолютно бездейственны... разве что служат приманкой.

foreignNames.name: 根潭女族长
foreignNames.text: {T}：选择目标生物。只要该生物被结附，你便获得其操控权。
foreignNames.flavor: 在根潭深处、恶水之底，陆行者的护符毫无效用...除非当作诱饵。

cards.originalText: {T}: Gain control of target creature as long as that creature is enchanted.

cards.name: Royal Assassin
cards.text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
cards.flavor: Trained in the arts of stealth, royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.

rulings.text: Can’t target itself because you choose the target before you tap him. At that time he is not yet a legal target.
If the creature is no longer tapped when the Assassin’s ability resolves, then the ability doesn’t resolve.

foreignNames.name: Meistermeuchler
foreignNames.text: {T}: Zerstöre eine getappte Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: In den Künsten der Verschwörung wohl ausgebildet, wählen die Meistermeuchler ihre Opfer sorgfältig. Sie verlassen sich lieber auf den rechten Zeitpunkt und Präzision als auf rohe Gewalt.

foreignNames.name: Asesino real
foreignNames.text: {T}: Destruye la criatura objetivo girada.
foreignNames.flavor: Entrenados en las artes del sigilo, los asesinos reales eligen a sus víctimas cuidadosamente basándose en el momento indicado y la precisión, en vez de en la fuerza bruta.

foreignNames.name: Assassin royal
foreignNames.text: {T} : Détruisez la créature engagée ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: Entraînés aux arts furtifs, les assassins royaux choisissent tout particulièrement leurs victimes, préférant la préparation et la précision à la force brute.

foreignNames.name: Assassino Reale
foreignNames.text: {T}: Distruggi una creatura TAPpata bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Addestrati nell'arte del sotterfugio, gli assassini reali scelgono le loro vittime con cura e si affidano al tempismo e alla precisione piuttosto che alla forza bruta.

foreignNames.name: 凄腕の暗殺者
foreignNames.text: {T}：タップ状態のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 隠密行動に長けた凄腕の暗殺者は、注意深く犠牲者を選ぶ。彼らが頼むのは腕っぷしではなく、タイミングと正確さだ。

foreignNames.name: Assassino da Realeza
foreignNames.text: {T}: Destrua a criatura alvo virada.
foreignNames.flavor: Treinados nas artes da dissimulação, os assassinos da realeza escolhem suas vítimas com cuidado, contando mais com o senso de oportunidade e a precisão do que com a força bruta.

foreignNames.name: Королевский Убийца
foreignNames.text: {T}: Уничтожьте целевое повернутое существо.
foreignNames.flavor: Королевские убийцы хорошо обучены своему ремеслу, они аккуратно выбирают жертв, полагаясь больше на точность и расчет, нежели на грубую силу.

foreignNames.name: 皇家刺客
foreignNames.text: {T}：消灭目标已横置的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 修习匿踪技艺的皇家刺客总是细心选择其牺牲品，不倚仗蛮力，即时且精准地行动。

cards.originalText: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

cards.name: Rule of Law
cards.text: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.
cards.flavor: Appointed by the kha himself, members of the tribunal ensure all disputes are settled with the utmost fairness.

rulings.text: Rule of Law looks at the entire turn to see if a player has cast a spell, even if Rule of Law wasn’t on the battlefield when that spell was cast. Notably, you can’t cast Rule of Law and then cast another spell during the same turn.
If you cast a spell that was countered, you can’t cast another spell during the same turn.

foreignNames.name: Rechtsstaatlichkeit
foreignNames.text: Jeder Spieler kann nicht mehr als einen Zauberspruch pro Zug spielen.
foreignNames.flavor: Die vom Kha persönlich bestimmten Mitglieder des Tribunals sorgen dafür, dass alle Konflikte mit allergrößter Fairness ausgetragen werden.

foreignNames.name: Imperio de la ley
foreignNames.text: Ningún jugador puede jugar más de un hechizo cada turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Los miembros del tribunal, nombrados por el mismo kha, aseguran que todas las disputas se resuelvan con suma imparcialidad.

foreignNames.name: Autorité de la loi
foreignNames.text: Aucun joueur ne peut jouer plus d'un sort par tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Nommés par le kha, les membres du tribunal tranchent les litiges avec équité — et sans appel.

foreignNames.name: Regola della Legge
foreignNames.text: Ogni giocatore non può giocare più di una magia per turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Nominati dal kha in persona, i membri del tribunale si assicurano che tutti i processi si concludano nella più assoluta imparzialità.

foreignNames.name: 法の定め
foreignNames.text: 各プレイヤーは、毎ターン１つしか呪文をプレイできない。
foreignNames.flavor: 王自身に指名された裁きの面々は、すべての論議が究極の公平さの下に行われていることを保障している。

foreignNames.name: Regra de Lei
foreignNames.text: Nenhum jogador pode jogar mais do que uma mágica a cada turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Indicados pelo próprio cã, os membros do tribunal garantem que todas as disputas sejam resolvidas com a máxima justiça.

foreignNames.name: Власть Закона
foreignNames.text: Каждый игрок не может разыгрывать более одного заклинания за ход.
foreignNames.flavor: Назначенные самим Ка, члены трибунала следят за тем, чтобы все тяжбы разрешались предельно справедливо.

foreignNames.name: 依法治理
foreignNames.text: 每位牌手每回合不能使用一个以上的咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 裁决所的成员由狮王亲自指派，以确保所有争端都得到最公正的解决。

cards.originalText: Each player can't play more than one spell each turn.

cards.name: Rushwood Dryad
cards.text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
cards.flavor: To a dryad, every tree in the forest is both a doorway and a window.

foreignNames.name: Harschforst-Dryaden
foreignNames.text: Waldtarnung (Diese Kreatur ist unblockbar, solange der verteidigende Spieler einen Wald kontrolliert.)
foreignNames.flavor: Für Dryaden ist jeder Baum im Wald eine Tür und ein Fenster.

foreignNames.name: Dríada de Rushwood
foreignNames.text: Cruza bosques. (Esta criatura es imbloqueable mientras el jugador defensor controle un bosque.)
foreignNames.flavor: Para una dríada, cada árbol del bosque es tanto una entrada como una ventana.

foreignNames.name: Dryade de Paillebois
foreignNames.text: Traversée des forêts (Cette créature est imblocable tant que le joueur défenseur contrôle au moins une forêt.)
foreignNames.flavor: Pour les dryades, tout arbre de la forêt est à la fois une porte et une fenêtre.

foreignNames.name: Driade di Bosco Lesto
foreignNames.text: Passa-Foreste (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata fintanto che il giocatore in difesa controlla una Foresta.)
foreignNames.flavor: Per una driade, ogni albero della foresta è sia una porta che una finestra.

foreignNames.name: ラッシュウッドのドライアド
foreignNames.text: 森渡り （このクリーチャーは防御プレイヤーが森をコントロールしている限りブロックされない。）
foreignNames.flavor: ドライアドにとって、森の木々は扉や窓のようなものだ。

foreignNames.name: Dríade de Rushwood
foreignNames.text: Travessia de Floresta (Esta criatura não poderá ser bloqueada enquanto o jogador defensor controlar uma Floresta.)
foreignNames.flavor: Para uma dríade, cada árvore da floresta é tanto uma porta quanto uma janela.

foreignNames.name: Рашвудская Дриада
foreignNames.text: Знание Лесов (Это существо не может быть заблокировано, пока защищающийся игрок контролирует Лес.)
foreignNames.flavor: Для дриады каждое дерево в лесу - это и дверь, и окно.

foreignNames.name: 银叶林树灵
foreignNames.text: 树林行者（只要防御牌手操控树林，此生物便不能被阻挡。）
foreignNames.flavor: 对树灵来说，林中的树既是门口也是窗户。

cards.originalText: Forestwalk

cards.name: Rushwood Dryad
cards.text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
cards.flavor: To a dryad, every tree in the forest is both a doorway and a window.

cards.name: Sage Owl
cards.text:
Flying
When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

foreignNames.name: Weise Eule
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)
Wenn die Weise Eule ins Spiel kommt, schaue dir die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek an und lege sie in beliebiger Reihenfolge zurück.

foreignNames.name: Búho sabio
foreignNames.text:
Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)
Cuando el Búho sabio entre en juego, mira las primeras cuatro cartas de tu biblioteca y regrésalas en cualquier orden.

foreignNames.name: Hibou savant
foreignNames.text:
Vol (Cette créature ne peut être bloquée que par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)
Quand le Hibou savant arrive en jeu, regardez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque, puis remettez-les dessus dans l'ordre de votre choix.

foreignNames.name: Gufo Sapiente
foreignNames.text:
Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)
Quando il Gufo Sapiente entra in gioco, guarda le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio, poi rimettile a posto in qualsiasi ordine.

foreignNames.name: 物知りフクロウ
foreignNames.text:
飛行 （このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）
物知りフクロウが場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーのカードを上から４枚見る。その後、それらを望む順番で戻す。

foreignNames.name: Coruja Sábia
foreignNames.text:
Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com a habilidade de voar ou alcance.)
Quando Coruja Sábia entrar em jogo, olhe os quatro cards do topo de seu grimório e coloque-os de volta em qualquer ordem.

foreignNames.name: Мудрая Сова
foreignNames.text:
Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существом с Полетом или Захватом.)
Когда Мудрая Сова входит в игру, посмотрите четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки, затем положите их обратно в любом порядке.

foreignNames.name: 睿智的猫头鹰
foreignNames.text:
飞行（只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡它。）
当睿智的猫头鹰进场时，检视你牌库顶的四张牌，然后将它们以任意顺序放回。

cards.originalText:
Flying
When Sage Owl comes into play, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

cards.name: Sage Owl
cards.text:
Flying
When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

cards.name: Samite Healer
cards.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
cards.flavor: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

foreignNames.name: Feldscher
foreignNames.text: {T}: Verhindere den nächsten 1 Schadenspunkt, der in diesem Zug einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl zugefügt würde.
foreignNames.flavor: Heiler erlangen schließlich die göttliche Gabe geistiger und körperlicher Einheit. Den Ergebensten von ihnen wird zusätzlich die Fähigkeit zuteil, körperliche Gesundheit an andere weiterzugeben.

foreignNames.name: Sanador samita
foreignNames.text: {T}: Prevén el siguiente 1 punto de daño que se le fuera a hacer a la criatura o jugador objetivo este turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Los curanderos finalmente adquieren los dones divinos de la integridad espiritual y física. A los más devotos también les conceden la habilidad de pasar la integridad física a otros.

foreignNames.name: Guérisseur sanctif
foreignNames.text: {T} : Prévenez, ce tour-ci, la prochaine 1 blessure qui devrait être infligée à une cible, créature ou joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: Les guérisseurs finissent par acquérir les dons divins de plénitude physique et spirituelle. Les plus fervents acquièrent la capacité de passer cette plénitude à autrui.

foreignNames.name: Guaritore Bianco
foreignNames.text: {T}: Previeni il prossimo punto danno che verrebbe inflitto a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor: I guaritori acquisiscono essenzialmente i doni divini dell'integrità fisica e spirituale. Solo i più devoti tra loro ricevono anche l'abilità di passare ad altri l'integrità fisica.

foreignNames.name: サマイトの癒し手
foreignNames.text: {T}：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。このターン、次にそれに与えられるダメージを１点軽減する。
foreignNames.flavor: 癒し手は、最終的には、霊的かつ肉体的な完全さという天の賜物を獲得する。 最も献身的な者はまた、その肉体的な完全さを他者に分け与える力を授かる。

foreignNames.name: Curandeiro Samita
foreignNames.text: {T}: Previna o próximo 1 ponto de dano que seria causado à criatura ou ao jogador alvo neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Os curandeiros acabam por adquirir os dons divinos da integridade física e espiritual. Aos mais devotos, também é concedida a habilidade de passar a integridade física para outros.

foreignNames.name: Самитский Лекарь
foreignNames.text: {T}: Предотвратите следующее 1 повреждение, которое будет нанесено целевому существу или игроку в этом ходу.
foreignNames.flavor: Лекари получают божественный дар духовной и физической цельности. А самым лучшим из них даруется способность передавать эту цельность окружающим.

foreignNames.name: 撒姆尼人的医疗员
foreignNames.text: {T}：于本回合中，防止接下来将对目标生物或牌手造成的1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 医疗员们终究会得到神赐的健全身心。 其中最虔诚者还将获赐使他人身体健全的能力。

cards.originalText: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

cards.name: Scalpelexis
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Scalpelexis deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top four cards of their library. If two or more of those cards have the same name, repeat this process.

rulings.text: The “repeat this process” means to repeat as often as it takes to not get a matching pair.

foreignNames.name: Scalpelexis
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)
Immer wenn Scalpelexis einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, entfernt dieser Spieler die obersten vier Karten seiner Bibliothek ganz aus dem Spiel. Falls zwei oder mehr dieser Karten denselben Namen haben, wiederhole diesen Vorgang.

foreignNames.name: Escalpelexis
foreignNames.text:
Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)
Siempre que Escalpelexis haga daño de combate a un jugador, ese jugador remueve del juego las primeras cuatro cartas de su biblioteca. Si dos o más de esas cartas tienen el mismo nombre, repite este proceso.

foreignNames.name: Scalpelexis
foreignNames.text:
Vol (Cette créature ne peut être bloquée que par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)
À chaque fois que le Scalpelexis inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, ce joueur retire de la partie les quatre cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque. Si au moins deux de ces cartes ont le même nom, répétez cette procédure.

foreignNames.name: Scalpatore
foreignNames.text:
Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)
Ogniqualvolta lo Scalpatore infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, quel giocatore rimuove dal gioco le prime quattro carte del suo grimorio. Se due o più di quelle carte hanno lo stesso nome, ripeti questo procedimento.

foreignNames.name: 切除するもの
foreignNames.text:
飛行 （このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）
切除するものがいずれかのプレイヤーに戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上から４枚のカードをゲームから取り除く。 それらのカードのうち２枚以上が同じ名前である場合、この手順を繰り返す。

foreignNames.name: Escalpelexis
foreignNames.text:
Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com a habilidade de voar ou alcance.)
Toda vez que Escalpelexis causa dano de combate a um jogador, aquele jogador remove de jogo os quatro primeiros cards de seu próprio grimório. Se dois ou mais desses cards tiverem o mesmo nome, repita este processo.

foreignNames.name: Скальполекс
foreignNames.text:
Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существом с Полетом или Захватом.)
Каждый раз, когда Скальполекс наносит боевые повреждения игроку, тот игрок удаляет из игры четыре верхние карты своей библиотеки. Если две или более из тех карт имеют одинаковое имя, повторите этот процесс.

foreignNames.name: 史卡佩雷克斯
foreignNames.text:
飞行（只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡它。）
每当史卡佩雷克斯对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手将他牌库顶的四张牌移出对战。 若该些牌中有两张或更多牌的名称相同，则重复此流程。

cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Scalpelexis deals combat damage to a player, that player removes the top four cards of his or her library from the game. If two or more of those cards have the same name, repeat this process.

cards.name: Scalpelexis
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Scalpelexis deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top four cards of their library. If two or more of those cards have the same name, repeat this process.

rulings.text: The “repeat this process” means to repeat as often as it takes to not get a matching pair.

cards.name: Scathe Zombies
cards.flavor:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose, Nor spake, nor moved their eyes; It had been strange, even in a dream, To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

foreignNames.name: Seelenlose Zombies
foreignNames.flavor: „Sie stöhnten und bewegten sich, erhoben sich alsbald, Sie sprachen nicht, die Augen starr; Selbst in 'nem Traum wär's sonderbar, Die Toten aufersteh'n zu seh'n, die blassen Leichen kalt." —Samuel Taylor Coleridge, „Die Ballade vom alten Seemann"

foreignNames.name: Zombies dañinos
foreignNames.flavor: "Gimieron, se agitaron, todos se levantaron, Ni hablaron ni movieron los ojos; Hasta en un sueño hubiera sido extraño, Ver a aquellos muertos levantarse." —Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "La balada del viejo marinero"

foreignNames.name: Zombies dévastateurs
foreignNames.flavor: « Comme un nageur venant du profond de son plonge, Tous sortent de la mort, comme l'on sort d'un songe. » —Agrippa d'Aubigné, La résurrection des morts

foreignNames.name: Zombie della Distruzione
foreignNames.flavor: "Con un gemito, tesero i muscoli e si levarono, Non dissero verbo o ruotarono gli occhi; Era ben strano anche in un sogno, Vedere i morti rialzarsi dal sonno." —Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "La Ballata del Vecchio Marinaio"

foreignNames.name: スケイズ・ゾンビ
foreignNames.flavor: うなり、うごめき、そいつらは立ち上がる。 言葉もなし、その目に動きもなし。 それは夢だとしても、あまりに奇妙なこと。 こんな死人が蘇るなど。 ――サミュエル・コールリッジ 「老水夫行」

foreignNames.name: Zumbis de Scathe
foreignNames.flavor: "Gemeram, se moveram e depois se ergueram, Sem falar, sem olhar; Mesmo em sonho, era estranho ver tanto homem morto Do chão se levantar." — Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "A Balada do Velho Marinheiro"

foreignNames.name: Смертоносные Зомби
foreignNames.flavor: "Вздохнули, встали, побрели, В молчанье, в тишине. Я на идущих мертвецов Смотрел, как в страшном сне". — Сэмюел Тейлор Колридж, "Сказание о старом мореходе"

foreignNames.name: 枯萎灵俑
foreignNames.flavor: 「它们呻吟、碰撞，站起身来， 口不言语，眼不理睬； 看到死人如此复生， 即使在梦中，还是很古怪。」 ～山缪·泰勒·柯律芝， 「古舟子咏」

cards.name: Scion of the Wild
cards.text: Scion of the Wild's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
cards.flavor: It has a hundred thousand extinctions to avenge.

foreignNames.name: Spross der Wildnis
foreignNames.text: Stärke und Widerstandskraft des Sprosses der Wildnis sind gleich der Anzahl der Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: Er muss hunderttausend ausgestorbene Tierarten rächen.

foreignNames.name: Vástago de lo salvaje

cards.name: Sculpting Steel
cards.text: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: An artificer once dropped one in a vault full of coins. She has yet to find it.

rulings.text: Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied artifact will trigger when Sculpting Steel enters the battlefield. Any “as enters the battlefield” or “enters the battlefield with” abilities of the chosen artifact will also work. For example, if Sculpting Steel copies an artifact creature with sunburst, the copy will get +1/+1 counters based on the number of different colors of mana used to pay Sculpting Steel’s total cost. If Sculpting Steel copies a noncreature artifact with sunburst, the copy will get charge counters based on the number of different colors of mana used to pay Sculpting Steel’s total cost.

Sculpting Steel doesn’t copy whether the original artifact is tapped or untapped. It also doesn’t copy any counters on that artifact, any Auras or Equipment attached to that artifact, or any effects that are currently affecting that artifact — you get exactly what’s printed on the chosen card and nothing more. So if you copy an animated Chimeric Staff, for example, you get a normal, nonanimated Chimeric Staff.

If the chosen artifact is copying something else (for example, if the chosen artifact is another Sculpting Steel), then your Sculpting Steel enters the battlefield as whatever the chosen artifact copied.

If the chosen artifact is a token, your Sculpting Steel copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that put it onto the battlefield. Your Sculpting Steel is not considered to be a token.
You can choose not to copy anything. In that case, Sculpting Steel stays on the battlefield as an artifact that doesn’t do much of anything.

rulings.text: Other effects can prevent a permanent from untapping during an untap step. You do need to look carefully, however, as many effects say that the permanent does not untap during its controller’s untap step, and this card’s ability occurs during other players’ untap steps. If a card does say this, then Seedborn Muse can untap it. But some other abilities are not written this way and can still prevent a card from untapping.
All your permanents untap during each other player’s untap step. You have no choice about what untaps.

rulings.text: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

cards.name: Shunt
cards.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
cards.flavor: Aranghil held her fury in her heart, hard and bright as a ruby. With its razor edge, she rewrote the laws of battle.

rulings.text: The target of a spell that targets another spell on the stack can be changed to any other spell on the stack, even if the new target will resolve before the spell does.
You can’t make a spell which is on the stack target itself.

You can choose to make a spell on the stack target this spell (if such a target choice would be legal had the spell been cast while this spell was on the stack). The new target for the deflected spell is not chosen until this spell resolves. This spell is still on the stack when new targets are selected for the spell.
Once the spell resolves, the new target is considered to be targeted by the deflected spell. This will trigger any effects which trigger on being targeted.
This does not check if the current target is legal. It just checks if the spell has a single target.
You choose the spell to target on announcement, but you pick the new target for that spell on resolution.
If there is no other legal target for the spell, this does not change the target.
This only targets the spell being changed, not the original or new target of the spell it is affecting.
If a spell targets multiple things, you can’t target it with Shunt, even if all but one of those targets has become illegal.
If a spell targets the same player or object multiple times, you can’t target it with Shunt.
